edu.brown.cs.ivy.jcomp

Class JcompControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.ivy.jcomp.JcompControl

  • public class JcompControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class for accessing the Java compilation framework. It provides entry points for compiling a single file or a set of files or a set of files with respect to an existing context.

    • Method Detail

      • addBaseJars

        public void addBaseJars(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> jars)

      • useAndroid

        public void useAndroid()

      • getSemanticData

        public JcompSemantics getSemanticData(JcompSource rf)
        Return a handle to the semantic data for a given source file. This call should be used to get the data for a single file after creating a JcompProject with that file and resolving the project.

      • getProject

        public JcompProject getProject(java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs)
        Return a handle to the semantic data for a set of files. These files are compiled together so that they can refer to each other.

      • getProject

        public JcompProject getProject(java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs,
                      boolean android)

      • getProject

        public JcompProject getProject(java.lang.String jar,
                      java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs)
        Return a handle to the semantic data for a set of files. These files are compiled together so they can refer to each other. In addition, the name of a jar file can be provided. All the classes in the corresonding jar file will be accessible when compiling the set of files.

      • getProject

        public JcompProject getProject(java.lang.String jar,
                      java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs,
                      boolean android)

      • getProject

        public JcompProject getProject(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> jars,
                      java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs)

                      java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs,
                      boolean android)

      • freeProject

        public void freeProject(JcompProject proj)

      • getSemanticData

        @Deprecated
public JcompProject getSemanticData(java.lang.String jar,
                                      java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs)
        Deprecated. 
        Return a handle to the semantic data for a set of files. These files are compiled together so they can refer to each other. In addition, the name of a jar file can be provided. All the classes in the corresonding jar file will be accessible when compiling the set of files. Use getProject instead.

      • getSemanticData

        @Deprecated
public JcompProject getSemanticData(java.util.Collection<JcompSource> rfs)
        Deprecated. 
        Return a handle to the semantic data for a set of files. These files are compiled together so that they can refer to each other. (Use getProject instead).

      • getTyper

        public JcompTyper getTyper(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> jars,
                  boolean android)
        Return a JavaTyper with the appropriate context for looking up system types.
